channel.title: Gmail on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Gmail on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Google says Gmail security is “strong and effective” as it denies major breach
item.description: Google refutes claims that all 2.5 billion Gmail users are at risk.

item.title: FTC claims Gmail filtering Republican emails threatens “American freedoms”
item.description: FTC chairman revives GOP claims previously rejected by judge and election agency.
